name: Space Toads Mayhem
description: A no nonsense, no autofire hiscore attack. A fast-paced, reflex-based topdown shoot 'em up. Like 1980s arcade-flavoured ice cream with laser blast sprinkles...
minimum_requirements: OS: 8.1 Processor: 1.8GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1600 MB available space Sound Card: Built In Additional Notes: Internet connection for Steamworks (Leaderboards & Achievements)
